title: A question about PBE
body:
When can I sign up for the PBE again? I really want to try the new Xin Zhao, but the sign up was closed.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: I don't have any updates on this yet.  :(  Our devs are keeping updates on the [PBE Status](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/) page though.  Keep an eye out!
